title: maestro error
body:
Hi,

When I login the game launches and after 5 seconds it crashes and there is a report. When I Restart it says cant connect to maestro or something. Ive had this problem for 4 days no and tried alot.

-Restarting
-Dns flush
-Public DNS with riot url as search domain
-Changing server to North East and back
-Resetting Safari
-Firewall off/ on
-Reinstalling game
-hextech repair tool

This problem just came outta nowhere, im on a mac. Version El Capitan. Can someone please help me out.......

Greetings

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be failing to reach the authentication server, so it can't lead you into the client.  I know you've done a few troubleshooting steps so far, and I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure every possibility is covered.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions.
